s:a white m typist aged 35 ys presents with increased Kidney over 3 years. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 183 cm, Weight 59.4 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 16 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Extracorporeal shockwave lithotripsy - ureter.
